item.title: Helping launch beCorporate enterprise ride-hailing service
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Industry Transportation / Ride-hailing Location Vietnam Business context beGroup needed to launch their enterprise ride-hailing service on a tight timeline while their in-house team was focused on their core consumer app
